newsitem.title: USA: Enron Portland Gen'l seek merger clearance.
newsitem.headline: Enron Portland Gen'l seek merger clearance.

text.p: Enron Corp said Tuesday it filed a request with the Oregon Public Utilities Commission seeking authorization to merge with Portland General Corp, the parent company of Portland General Electric.
Enron and Portland General announced July 22 the merger proposal had been approved by directors of both companies.

By law, the commission has 19 days to act on the application. In order to all ow an opportunity for comment, Enron said, it waived the 19-day period and substituted December 31 for the final commission action.
The company noted the application only requests approval of the Enron, Portland General combination and does not ask the commission to prejudge the industry restructuring issues that are before it.
The merger also requires approval from shareholders of both companies and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.
